A children's book about a fish that learns to climb trees and explores the world beyond its aquatic habitat.
A short film about a group of fish that embark on a journey to climb a tree and discover the secrets of the world above.
A video game where players control a fish as it navigates through a forest, climbing trees and solving puzzles to reach its goal.
A science fiction story where a group of humans discover a fish that has evolved to climb trees and use its unique abilities to explore the depths of the forest.
A documentary about the discovery of a fish species that has adapted to live in tree-top environments, and the impact of this adaptation on their survival.
